titleInfo.title: 16th Bluegrass and Country Festival and Memorial Days at Rebel Park (18544)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing the 16th Bluegrass and Country Festival and Memorial Days featuring Grandpa Jones and Ramona, Charlie Louvin and the Big Men, David Houston, Jimmie and Anna Davis, Chubby Wise, Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper, Areno Boys, Sullivan Family, Amazing Grace, and more at Rebel Park on May 13, 14, and 15. Poster features metal photoplates of Grandpa Jones, Charlie Louvin, and David Houston. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/45328/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
